Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Convert to multi-page app with React Router and improve partner logos

Major changes:
- Installed react-router-dom for proper routing
- Created modular component structure:
  - src/pages/ \(HomePage, UseCasesPage, ContactPage\)
  - src/components/layout/ \(Navigation, Footer, Layout\)
  - src/components/sections/ \(Hero, Partners, AIBenefits, USPs, Services, FAQ\)
  - src/components/forms/ \(ContactForm with all validation logic\)
  - src/utils/ \(validation utilities\)

New features:
- React Router with 3 routes: /, /use-cases, /contact
- Updated PartnersSection with gradient cards matching screenshot design
- New UseCasesPage with:
  - AI automation examples by industry \(Sales, Customer Service, Operations, HR\)
  - Concrete use case examples \(Email Drafting, Meeting Notes, Data Analysis, etc.\)
  - Interactive ROI calculator
  - CTA to contact page
- Standalone ContactPage with both consultation and scan forms
- GitHub Pages routing support \(404.html redirect\)
- Navigation with active route highlighting
- Backward compatibility for hash-based URLs \(#contact\)

Technical improvements:
- Modular component architecture \(extracted from 1,401-line monolith\)
- Shared Layout wrapper with Navigation and Footer
- Type-safe form interfaces
- Reusable validation utilities
- Updated Tailwind config for new structure
- All existing functionality preserved \(forms, validation, animations\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
